nodes.beat: Jonathan Harker, a quantum physicist, gets an invitation from Count Dracula to discuss a scientific project.
Harker travels to the Quantum Realm, a mysterious dimension where different laws of physics apply.
Dracula reveals his plan to use quantum technology to control time and space.
Harker, realizing the danger, decides to stop Dracula.
Harker secretly communicates with his fianc√©e, Mina, about Dracula's plan using quantum entanglement.
Mina, along with her friend Lucy, starts gathering help in the normal world.
Harker sabotages Dracula's quantum machine, causing a massive explosion.
Dracula, weakened by the explosion, retreats into his quantum coffin.
Harker escapes the Quantum Realm and reunites with Mina.
Harker, intrigued by Dracula's project, decides to join him.
Harker helps Dracula to perfect the quantum machine, but secretly plans to double-cross him.
Harker betrays Dracula at the last moment, causing the quantum machine to malfunction.
Dracula, trapped in a quantum loop, is defeated.
Harker returns to the normal world and warns humanity about the dangers of quantum technology.
Jonathan Harker, a quantum physicist, is kidnapped by Count Dracula to work on a mysterious project.
Dracula forces Harker to build a quantum machine to control time and space.
Mina and Lucy team up with Professor Van Helsing, an expert in quantum physics.
nodes.summary: Mina, Lucy team with Van Helsing

nodes.beat: Van Helsing creates a quantum portal to rescue Harker and stop Dracula.
Harker and Van Helsing defeat Dracula, destroying the quantum machine and the Quantum Realm.
Harker, Mina, Lucy, and Van Helsing return to the normal world, vowing to keep the Quantum Realm a secret.
Harker and Dracula successfully create the quantum machine, altering the laws of time and space.
Van Helsing confronts Harker and Dracula in the Quantum Realm, leading to a quantum duel.
Harker realizes his mistake and helps Van Helsing to defeat Dracula.
Harker, Mina, Lucy, and Van Helsing return to the normal world, vowing to destroy all knowledge of the Quantum Realm.
